name: The Maze (itch) (unflappedoyster)
description:
The Maze is a race against time to beat the 5 procedurally generated mazes as fast as you can. Set in a dystopian future where Earth is running out of space for people to live, you must beat the mazes against the clock to secure your place on Earth!

 hopefully if you're quick enough you will be given the chance to return home.
